verse.lines: Yoke up, yoke up with Jesus, abide in Him alone! The creeds of men will fail you; ye dare not trust your own; Naught but a full salvation in Christ, the truth, the way, Can give your spirit boldness in that last judgment day. Yoke up, yoke up with Jesus, the evening time is here: Probation’s day is waning, eternity is near! The Bridegroom soon is coming, before Whom all shall bow; If you prepared would meet Him, then yoke up with Him now.
